mapper.select: select p.plan_detail_id, p.plan_days_id, p.plan_id, p.content_id, p.overview, c.content_name, a.title, a.addr1, a.addr2, a.first_image, a.first_image2 from plan_detail p left join attraction_info a on p.content_id = a.content_id left join content_type c on a.content_type_id = c.content_type_id where p.plan_id=#{plan_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_detail (plan_days_id, content_id, overview) VALUES (#{plan_days_id}, #{content_id}, #{overview})
insert into plan_detail(plan_id, plan_days_ content_id) values (#{plan_id}, #{content_id})
mapper.delete: delete pdt from ( plan p left join plan_days pd on p.plan_id = pd.plan_id left join plan_detail pdt on pd.plan_days_id = pdt.plan_days_id) where p.userid=#{userId};
